title.raw: 《孝武本紀》 Annals of the Xiaowu Emperor

sentences.zh: 孝武皇帝者，孝景中子也。
母曰王太后。
孝景四年，以皇子為膠東王。
孝景七年，栗太子廢為臨江王，以膠東王為太子。
孝景十六年崩，太子即位，為孝武皇帝。
孝武皇帝初即位，尤敬鬼神之祀。

translations.literal: Emperor Xiaowu was Emperor Xiaojing's middle son. His mother was called Empress Dowager Wang. In Emperor Xiaojing's fourth year, he was made King of Jiaodong as an imperial son. In Emperor Xiaojing's seventh year, Crown Prince Li was deposed to become King of Linjiang, and the King of Jiaodong was made Crown Prince. Emperor Xiaojing collapsed in the sixteenth year. The Crown Prince ascended the throne and became Emperor Xiaowu. When Emperor Xiaowu first ascended the throne, he especially respected the sacrifices to ghosts and spirits.

sentences.zh: 元年，漢興已六十餘歲矣，天下乂安，薦紳之屬皆望天子封禪改正度也。
而上鄉儒術，招賢良，趙綰、王臧等以文學為公卿，欲議古立明堂城南，以朝諸侯。
草巡狩封禪改歷服色事未就。
會竇太后治黃老言，不好儒術，使人微得趙綰等姦利事，召案綰、臧，綰、臧自殺，諸所興為者皆廢。

translations.literal: In the first year, the Han had risen already over sixty years. The realm was pacified and peaceful. All the scholar-officials hoped the Son of Heaven would perform the fengshan ceremony and correct the calendar measures. The emperor favored Confucian arts and recruited the worthy and good. Zhao Wan, Wang Zang, and others became ministers through literature. They wished to discuss the ancient practice of establishing a Bright Hall south of the city to receive the feudal lords. The matters of drafting imperial tours, fengshan ceremonies, changing the calendar, and clothing colors were not completed. Empress Dowager Dou governed with Huang-Lao teachings and did not like Confucian arts. She had someone secretly obtain evidence of Zhao Wan and others' illicit profits, summoned and investigated Wan and Zang. Wan and Zang committed suicide. All the things they had promoted were abolished.

sentences.zh: 後六年，竇太后崩。
其明年，上徵文學之士公孫弘等。

translations.literal: After six years, Empress Dowager Dou collapsed. The next year, the emperor summoned scholars of literature like Gongsun Hong.

sentences.zh: 明年，上初至雍，郊見五畤。
後常三歲一郊。
是時上求神君，捨之上林中蹄氏觀。
神君者，長陵女子，以子死悲哀，故見神於先後宛若。
宛若祠之其室，民多往祠。
平原君往祠，其後子孫以尊顯。
及武帝即位，則厚禮置祠之內中，聞其言，不見其人云。

translations.literal: The next year, the emperor first arrived at Yong and performed suburban audience at the five altars. Afterwards, he regularly performed suburban sacrifices every three years. At this time, the emperor sought the divine lord and lodged at the Ti clan observation in the middle of Shanglin. The divine lord was a woman from Changling. Because her son died and she was sorrowful, she therefore saw a spirit that resembled her deceased husband Wan Ruo. Wan Ruo sacrificed to her in her room. Many people went to sacrifice there. The Lord of Pingyuan went to sacrifice there. His later descendants became honored and illustrious. When Emperor Wu ascended the throne, he then placed her with thick ritual in the inner palace for sacrifice. One heard her words but did not see her person, it is said.

sentences.zh: 是時而李少君亦以祠灶、穀道、卻老方見上，上尊之。
少君者，故深澤侯入以主方。
匿其年及所生長，常自謂七十，能使物，卻老。
其游以方遍諸侯。
無妻子。
人聞其能使物及不死，更饋遺之，常餘金錢帛衣食。
人皆以為不治產業而饒給，又不知其何所人，愈信，爭事之。
少君資好方，善為巧發奇中。
嘗從武安侯飲，坐中有年九十餘老人，少君乃言與其大父游射處，老人為兒時從其大父行，識其處，一坐盡驚。
少君見上，上有故銅器，問少君。
少君曰：「此器齊桓公十年陳於柏寢。」
已而案其刻，果齊桓公器。
一宮盡駭，以少君為神，數百歲人也。

translations.literal: At this time, Li Shaogun also appeared before the emperor with methods of sacrificing to the stove, grain immortality, and dispelling old age. The emperor honored him. Shaogun was a person from the former Marquis of Shenze who came with the main methods. He concealed his age and where he grew up. He often claimed to be seventy, able to make things happen and dispel old age. His travels with methods reached everywhere among the feudal lords. He had no wife or children. People heard of his ability to make things happen and achieve immortality. They moreover fed and sent him gifts, often leaving surplus gold, money, silks, clothing, and food. People all considered that he did not manage estates yet had abundant supply, and moreover did not know where his income came from. They believed even more and contended to serve him. Shaogun was naturally good at methods and skilled at clever revelations that marveled and hit the mark. Once he followed the Marquis of Wuan drinking. In the seats there was an old man over ninety years. Shaogun then spoke of places where he had toured and shot with his grandfather. The old man, when he was a child, had followed his grandfather and gone there, and recognized those places. The entire gathering was astonished. Shaogun saw the emperor. The emperor had an old bronze vessel and asked Shaogun about it. Shaogun said: 'This vessel was displayed by Duke Huan of Qi in his tenth year at the Bo resting place.' Then they examined its inscriptions, and indeed it was a vessel of Duke Huan of Qi. The whole palace was startled, took Shaojun as a spirit, a several hundred years person also.

sentences.zh: 少君言於上曰：「祠灶則致物，致物而丹沙可化為黃金，黃金成以為飲食器則益壽，益壽而海中蓬萊僊者可見，見之以封禪則不死，黃帝是也。
臣嘗游海上，見安期生，食臣棗，大如瓜。
安期生僊者，通蓬萊中，合則見人，不合則隱。」
於是天子始親祠灶，而遣方士入海求蓬萊安期生之屬，而事化丹沙諸藥齊為黃金矣。

translations.literal: Shaojun spoke to the emperor said: 'Sacrifice stove then bring things. Bring things and cinnabar sand can transform into yellow gold. Yellow gold completed as food and drink vessels then increase longevity. Increase longevity and sea middle Penglai immortals can be seen. Seen with feng shan then not die. Yellow Emperor is this.' Minister once toured above the sea, saw An Qisheng, fed minister dates, big as melon. An Qisheng is an immortal person, connects to Penglai middle, when harmonious then sees people, when not harmonious then hides.' Thereupon the Son of Heaven began personally sacrificing to the stove, yet sent fangshi who entered the sea and sought Penglai and An Qisheng's kind, yet undertook transforming cinnabar sand and various medicines together into yellow gold.

sentences.zh: 居久之，李少君病死。
天子以為化去不死也，而使黃錘史寬舒受其方。
求蓬萊安期生莫能得，而海上燕齊怪迂之方士多相效，更言神事矣。

translations.literal: Stayed a long time, Li Shaojun illness died. The Son of Heaven considered that he had transformed and departed, achieving immortality. He made the Huangchui Scribe Kuanshu receive his methods. He sought Penglai and An Qisheng but none could be obtained. Yet the coastal Yan and Qi strange and far-fetched method masters mostly imitated each other, moreover speaking of divine matters.

sentences.zh: 亳人薄誘忌奏祠泰一方，曰：「天神貴者泰一，泰一佐曰五帝。
古者天子以春秋祭泰一東南郊，用太牢具，七日，為壇開八通之鬼道。」
於是天子令太祝立其祠長安東南郊，常奉祠如忌方。
其後人有上書，言「古者天子三年一用太牢具祠神三一：天一，地一，泰一」。
天子許之，令太祝領祠之忌泰一壇上，如其方。
後人復有上書，言「古者天子常以春秋解祠，祠黃帝用一梟破鏡；
冥羊用羊；
祠馬行用一青牡馬；
泰一、皋山山君、地長用牛；
武夷君用乾魚；
陰陽使者以一牛」。
令祠官領之如其方，而祠於忌泰一壇旁。

translations.literal: The Bo person Bo Youji memorialized a method for sacrificing to Taiyi, saying: 'Among heaven's spirits, the noble one is Taiyi. Taiyi's assistants are called the Five Emperors.' The ancient Son of Heaven sacrificed to Taiyi in the southeast suburbs during spring and autumn, using complete great sacrificial animals, for seven days, making an altar that opened the eight directions for the ghost paths.' Thereupon the Son of Heaven commanded the Grand Invocator to establish his sacrifice in the southeast suburbs of Chang'an, constantly conducting the sacrifice according to Youji's method. Afterward, someone memorialized a book saying: 'The ancient Son of Heaven once every three years used complete great sacrificial animals to sacrifice to the three spirits: Heaven One, Earth One, Taiyi One.' The Son of Heaven permitted it and commanded the Grand Invocator to lead the sacrifice above Youji's Taiyi altar, according to his method. Later people again had submit memorial, spoke 'Ancient ones Son of Heaven often with spring autumn solved sacrifices, sacrificed Yellow Emperor used one xiao broken mirror; Mingyang used sheep; Sacrificed Maxing used one blue stallion; Taiyi, Gaoshan mountain lord, earth long used cattle; The Lord of Wuyi used dried fish; The yin yang envoys used one ox.' He commanded the sacrifice officials to lead it according to his method, and sacrifice at the side of Youji's Taiyi altar.

sentences.zh: 其後，天子苑有白鹿，以其皮為幣，以發瑞應，造白金焉。

translations.literal: Afterward, the Son of Heaven's park had a white deer. He made currency from its hide to issue auspicious responses, and made white gold there.

sentences.zh: 其明年，郊雍，獲一角獸，若麃然。
有司曰：「陛下肅祗郊祀，上帝報享，錫一角獸，蓋麟云。」
於是以薦五畤，畤加一牛以燎。
賜諸侯白金，以風符應合于天地。

translations.literal: The next year, at the suburban sacrifice in Yong, they obtained a one-horned beast, like a mi deer. The officials said: 'Your Majesty solemnly and respectfully performed the suburban sacrifice. The Supreme Deity responded and enjoyed it, bestowing a one-horned beast - probably a qilin.' Thereupon they offered it to the five altars, with each altar adding one ox for burning. He granted the feudal lords white gold, to make the talismans respond and unite with heaven and earth.

sentences.zh: 於是濟北王以為天子且封禪，乃上書獻泰山及其旁邑。
天子受之，更以他縣償之。
常山王有罪，遷，天子封其弟於真定，以續先王祀，而以常山為郡。
然後五嶽皆在天子之郡。

translations.literal: Thereupon the King of Jibei considered that the Son of Heaven was about to perform the fengshan ceremony, so he memorialized and offered Taishan and its neighboring cities. The Son of Heaven accepted it, and moreover compensated him with other counties. The King of Changshan had a crime and was banished. The Son of Heaven enfeoffed his younger brother at Zhending to continue the previous king's sacrifices, and made Changshan into a commandery. Then all five peaks were in the Son of Heaven's commanderies.

sentences.zh: 其明年，齊人少翁以鬼神方見上。
上有所幸王夫人，夫人卒，少翁以方術蓋夜致王夫人及灶鬼之貌云，天子自帷中望見焉。
於是乃拜少翁為文成將軍，賞賜甚多，以客禮禮之。
文成言曰：「上即欲與神通，宮室被服不象神，神物不至。」
乃作畫雲氣車，及各以勝日駕車辟惡鬼。
又作甘泉宮，中為臺室，畫天、地、泰一諸神，而置祭具以致天神。
居歲餘，其方益衰，神不至。
乃為帛書以飯牛，詳弗知也，言此牛腹中有奇。
殺而視之，得書，書言其怪，天子疑之。
有識其手書，問之人，果（為）［偽］書。
於是誅文成將軍而隱之。

translations.literal: The next year, the Qi person Shao Weng appeared before the emperor with ghost and spirit methods. The emperor had favored Lady Wang. The lady had died. Shao Weng with his method arts overnight brought the appearance of Lady Wang and the stove ghost, it is said. The Son of Heaven gazed and saw them from within the curtain. Thereupon then appointed Shao Weng as Wencheng general, rewards very many, treated him with guest ritual. Wencheng spoke said: 'Emperor immediately wants to connect with spirits, palaces and clothing do not resemble spirits, spirit things will not arrive.' Then made painted cloud qi carriage, and each with victory day drove carriage to ward off evil ghosts. Again made Ganquan palace, middle made platform rooms, painted heaven, earth, Taiyi and various spirits, yet placed sacrifice implements to bring heaven spirits. Stayed more than a year, their methods increasingly declined, spirits did not arrive. He then made a silk book and fed it to the ox, pretending not to know, saying that this ox's belly had a marvel. They killed and inspected it, obtained the book, the book spoke of its marvel. The Son of Heaven doubted it. Someone recognized his handwriting and asked people about it. Indeed it was a false book. Thereupon he executed the General of Wencheng but concealed it.

sentences.zh: 其後則又作柏梁、銅柱、承露僊人掌之屬矣。

translations.literal: Afterward, he then moreover made the Cypress Beam, Copper Pillar, Dew Receiving Immortal Person, and palm and such things.

sentences.zh: 文成死明年，天子病鼎湖甚，巫醫無所不致，（至）不愈。
游水發根乃言曰：「上郡有巫，病而鬼下之。」
上召置祠之甘泉。
及病，使人問神君。
神君言曰：「天子毋憂病。
病少愈，彊與我會甘泉。」
於是病愈，遂幸甘泉，病良已。
大赦天下，置壽宮神君。
神君最貴者（大夫）［太一］，其佐曰大禁、司命之屬，皆從之。
非可得見，聞其音，與人言等。
時去時來，來則風肅然也。
居室帷中。
時晝言，然常以夜。
天子祓，然後入。
因巫為主人，關飲食。
所欲者言行下。
又置壽宮、北宮，張羽旗，設供具，以禮神君。
神君所言，上使人受書其言，命之曰「畫法」。
其所語，世俗之所知也，毋絕殊者，而天子獨喜。
其事祕，世莫知也。

translations.literal: The year after Wencheng died, the Son of Heaven became very ill at Dinghu. Witch doctors were brought without limit, but he was not healed. You Shui Fagen then spoke and said: 'The Shang commandery has a witch. He was ill but a spirit descended upon him.' The emperor summoned and placed sacrifice at Ganquan. And when illness came, sent people to ask the spirit lord. The spirit lord spoke said: 'Son of Heaven, do not worry about illness. Illness slightly better, strong meet me at Ganquan.' Thereupon illness healed, then favored Ganquan, illness truly gone. He granted a great amnesty to the realm and established the Shou Palace for the divine lord. The divine lord's most noble was Taiyi. His assistants were called Great Prohibition, Controller of Fate, and such kinds. All followed him. He could not be seen, but his sound could be heard, equal to a person's speech. Sometimes he departed, sometimes he came. When he came, then the wind was solemn and calm. He resided in the room within the curtain. Sometimes he spoke in the daytime, but usually at night. The Son of Heaven performed purification, then entered. He used the witch as host, concerned with food and drink. What he desired, he spoke and it then descended. He moreover established the Shou Palace and North Palace, spread feather flags, set up offerings and utensils, to ritualize the divine lord. What the divine lord spoke, the emperor had someone receive and write down his words, naming it the 'painting method'. What he spoke of was what the world's customs knew, nothing extremely exceptional, yet the Son of Heaven alone was happy. His matters were secret; the world knew none of them.

sentences.zh: 其後三年，有司言元宜以天瑞命，不宜以一二數。
一元曰建元，二元以長星曰元光，三元以郊得一角獸曰元狩云。

translations.literal: Three years later, the officials said that 'yuan' should be named with heaven's auspicious signs, not suitable to use the numbers one and two. The first yuan was called Jian Yuan, the second yuan with a long star was called Yuan Guang, the third yuan with a suburban one-horned beast obtained was called Yuan Shou, it is said.

sentences.zh: 其明年冬，天子郊雍，議曰：「今上帝朕親郊，而後土毋祀，則禮不答也。」
有司與太史公、祠官寬舒等議：「天地牲角繭栗。
今陛下親祀后土，后土宜於澤中圜丘為五壇，壇一黃犢太牢具，已祠盡瘞，而從祠衣上黃。」
於是天子遂東，始立后土祠汾陰脽上，如寬舒等議。
上親望拜，如上帝禮。
禮畢，天子遂至滎陽而還。
過雒陽，下詔曰：「三代邈絕，遠矣難存。
其以三十里地封周後為周子南君，以奉先王祀焉。」
是歲，天子始巡郡縣，侵尋於泰山矣。

translations.literal: The next year in winter, the Son of Heaven performed suburban sacrifices at Yong and discussed, saying: 'Now I personally perform suburban sacrifices to the Supreme Deity, yet Houtu has no sacrifices, then the ritual is not reciprocal.' The officials discussed with the Grand Historian, sacrifice official Kuanshu, and others: 'Heaven and earth sacrificial animals' horns are cocoon chestnuts. Now Your Majesty personally sacrifices to Houtu. Houtu should have five altars made in a round mound in the marsh, each altar with one yellow calf and complete great sacrificial animals. After sacrificing, all are buried, and following the sacrifice, the clothing is upper yellow.' Thereupon the Son of Heaven then east, began establish Houtu sacrifice on Fenyin wei above, like Kuanshu etc discussed. The emperor personally gazed and bowed, like Supreme Deity ritual. Ritual completed, the Son of Heaven then arrived at Xingyang and returned. Passed Luoyang, issued edict said: 'Three dynasties distant and broken, far, difficult to preserve. With thirty li of land, enfeoff the Zhou descendants as Lord Zi Nan of Zhou, to conduct the previous kings' sacrifices there.' This year, the Son of Heaven began touring the commanderies and counties, gradually approaching Taishan.

sentences.zh: 其春，樂成侯上書言欒大。
欒大，膠東宮人，故嘗與文成將軍同師，已而為膠東王尚方。
而樂成侯姊為康王后，毋子。
康王死，他姬子立為王。
而康后有淫行，與王不相中（得），相危以法。
康后聞文成已死，而欲自媚於上，乃遣欒大因樂成侯求見言方。
天子既誅文成，後悔恨其早死，惜其方不盡，及見欒大，大悅。
大為人長美，言多方略，而敢為大言，處之不疑。
大言曰：「臣嘗往來海中，見安期、羨門之屬。
顧以為臣賤，不信臣。
又以為康王諸侯耳，不足予方。
臣數言康王，康王又不用臣。
臣之師曰：『黃金可成，而河決可塞，不死之藥可得，僊人可致也。』
臣恐效文成，則方士皆掩口，惡敢言方哉！」
上曰：「文成食馬肝死耳。
子誠能修其方，我何愛乎！」
大曰：「臣師非有求人，人者求之。
陛下必欲致之，則貴其使者，令有親屬，以客禮待之，勿卑，使各佩其信印，乃可使通言於神人。
神人尚肯邪不邪。
致尊其使，然後可致也。」
於是上使先驗小方，鬬旗，旗自相觸擊。

translations.literal: The next spring, the Marquis of Lecheng memorialized a book speaking of Luan Da. Luan Da was a palace person from Jiaodong. He formerly once studied with the same master as General Wencheng. Afterward he became King Jiaodong's favored artisan. Yet the Marquis of Lecheng's elder sister became Empress Kang, with no sons. King Kang died. Another consort's son was established as king. Yet Empress Kang had lewd conduct, did not get along with the king, and they mutually endangered each other with the law. Empress Kang heard that Wencheng had already died, yet wished to flatter herself to the emperor, so she sent Luan Da through Lecheng Hou to seek an audience and speak of methods. The Son of Heaven had already executed Wencheng. Afterward he regretted and resented his early death, cherished that his methods were not complete. When he saw Luan Da, he was greatly pleased. Da was a person tall and beautiful, spoke of many methods and strategies, yet dared to make big claims, and treated them without doubt. Da spoke and said: 'I once came and went in the sea, saw An Qi, Xian Men, and such kinds.' However, they considered me lowly and did not trust me. Moreover, they considered King Kang only a feudal lord, not worth giving methods to. I frequently spoke to King Kang, but King Kang moreover did not use me. Minister's teacher said: 'Yellow gold can be completed, yet river breach can be blocked, not die medicine can be obtained, immortals can be brought also.' Minister fears imitating Wencheng, then fangshi all cover mouth, how dare speak methods!' The emperor said: 'Wencheng ate horse liver and died only. You truly can repair their methods, I what would begrudge!' Da said: 'Minister's teacher does not seek people, people seek him. Your Majesty must want to bring them, then honor their envoys, command they have relatives, treat them with guest ritual, do not be lowly, make each wear their faith seal, then can make communicate words to spirit people. Do the spirit people still consent or not consent? Bring honor to their envoy, then they can be brought.' Thereupon the emperor had them first test small methods. The battle flags themselves mutually touched and attacked.

sentences.zh: 是時上方憂河決，而黃金不就，乃拜大為五利將軍。
居月餘，得四金印，佩天士將軍、地土將軍、大通將軍、天道將軍印。
制詔御史：「昔禹疏九江，決四瀆。
閒者河溢皋陸，隄繇不息。
朕臨天下二十有八年，天若遺朕士而大通焉。
乾稱『蜚龍』，『鴻漸于般』，意庶幾與焉。
其以二千戶封地士將軍大為樂通侯。」
賜列侯甲第，僮千人。
乘輿斥車馬帷帳器物以充其家。
又以衛長公主妻之，齎金萬斤，更名其邑曰當利公主。
天子親如五利之第。
使者存問所給，連屬於道。
自大主將相以下，皆置酒其家，獻遺之。
於是天子又刻玉印曰「天道將軍」，使使衣羽衣，夜立白茅上，五利將軍亦衣羽衣，立白茅上受印，以示弗臣也。
而佩「天道」者，且為天子道天神也。
於是五利常夜祠其家，欲以下神。
神未至而百鬼集矣，然頗能使之。
其後治裝行，東入海，求其師云。
大見數月，佩六印，貴振天下，而海上燕齊之閒，莫不搤捥而自言有禁方，能神僊矣。

translations.literal: At this time the emperor was just worried about the Yellow River breach, yet the yellow gold was not completed. He then appointed Da as Five Profits General. He resided over a month and obtained four gold seals, wearing the seals of Heaven Knight General, Earth Soil General, Great Passage General, and Heaven Way General. Imperial edict to the Imperial Secretary: 'Formerly Yu dredged the nine rivers and breached the four channels. Recently the Yellow River has overflowed Gao Lu, and the dike corvee labor has not ceased. I have faced the realm for twenty-eight years. Heaven, if it bestowed me a knight, would greatly pass there. Qian is called 'flying dragon', 'great goose gradually at plate'. The intention is almost with it there. With two thousand households, enfeoff the Earth Knight General Da as Marquis of Le Tong.' He granted the marquises first-rank mansions and a thousand youths. The imperial carriage discarded chariots, horses, curtains, tents, and utensils to fill his home. He moreover married him to the eldest princess of Wei, carried ten thousand jin of gold, and changed the name of his city to Dangli Princess. The Son of Heaven personally went to the Five Profits residence. Envoys visited and inquired about what was supplied, connected and attached along the road. From the great princess and generals and chancellors below, all set up wine at his home and offered gifts to him. Thereupon the Son of Heaven moreover carved a jade seal called 'Heaven Way General'. He made the envoy wear feather clothes and stand on white cogongrass at night. The Five Profits General also wore feather clothes and stood on white cogongrass to receive the seal, to show he was not a minister. Yet the one wearing 'Heaven Way' moreover guided heaven spirits for the Son of Heaven. Thereupon Five Profits often sacrificed at night in his home, wishing to descend spirits. The spirit had not arrived yet, but the hundred ghosts had already gathered. However, he was rather able to make them. Afterward he prepared equipment and went, entered the sea to the east, seeking his master, it is said. Da appeared for several months, wore six seals, noble and shook the realm, yet between coastal Yan and Qi, none did not grasp and writhe while claiming they had forbidden methods and could divine immortals.

sentences.zh: 其夏六月中，汾陰巫錦為民祠魏脽后土營旁，見地如鉤狀，掊視得鼎。
鼎大異於眾鼎，文鏤毋款識，怪之，言吏。
吏告河東太守勝，勝以聞。
天子使使驗問巫錦得鼎無姦詐，乃以禮祠，迎鼎至甘泉，從行，上薦之。
至中山，晏溫，有黃雲蓋焉。
有麃過，上自射之，因以祭雲。
至長安，公卿大夫皆議請尊寶鼎。
天子曰：「閒者河溢，歲數不登，故巡祭后土，祈為百姓育穀。
今年豐廡未有報，鼎曷為出哉？」
有司皆曰：「聞昔大帝興神鼎一，一者一統，天地萬物所系終也。
黃帝作寶鼎三，象天地人也。
禹收九牧之金，鑄九鼎，皆嘗鬺烹上帝鬼神。
遭聖則興，遷于夏商。
周德衰，宋之社亡，鼎乃淪伏而不見。
頌云『自堂徂基，自羊徂牛；
鼐鼎及鼒，不虞不驁，胡考之休』。
今鼎至甘泉，光潤龍變，承休無疆。
合茲中山，有黃白雲降蓋，若獸為符，路弓乘矢，集獲壇下，報祠大饗。
惟受命而帝者心知其意而合德焉。
鼎宜見於祖禰，藏於帝廷，以合明應。」
制曰：「可。」

translations.literal: In the middle of the sixth month of that summer, the Fenyin witch Jin was sacrificing to Houtu at the Wei Chong camp side for the people. She saw the ground in a hook shape, threw it down and inspected, obtaining a tripod. The tripod was greatly different from the crowd of tripods, with carved patterns but no inscriptions. She marveled at it and told the officials. The officials told the Grand Administrator of Hedong, Sheng, and Sheng reported it. The Son of Heaven had an envoy verify and question that the witch Jin obtained the tripod without illicit deceit. He then sacrificed with ritual, welcomed the tripod to Ganquan, followed the journey, and the emperor offered it. He arrived at Zhongshan. It was peaceful and warm, with yellow clouds covering it. A mi deer passed by. The emperor personally shot it and by means sacrificed to the cloud. He arrived at Chang'an. All the ministers, marquises, and grandees discussed and requested that the treasured tripod be honored. The Son of Heaven said: 'Recently the Yellow River overflowed, and for several years the harvests were not abundant. Therefore I toured and sacrificed to Houtu, praying for the commoners to grow grain. This year the abundant granaries have not had reports. Why would the tripod come out?' All the officials said: 'We have heard that formerly the Great Emperor raised a divine tripod one. One is unified - heaven, earth, and the ten thousand things are all tied to the end. The Yellow Emperor made three treasured tripods, symbolizing heaven, earth, and person. Yu collected gold from the nine regions, cast nine tripods, all once used to cook for the Supreme Deity and ghosts and spirits. When they encountered sages, they arose, moved to Xia and Shang. Zhou virtue declined, Song's altars perished, the tripod then sank and hid and was not seen. The ode says 'from hall to foundation, from sheep to ox; Nai tripods and gui, not unexpected not startled, how long-lasting happiness.' Now the tripod arrived at Ganquan, its light moist and dragon-like changed, receiving boundless blessing. United with this Zhongshan, yellow and white clouds descended and covered it, like beasts making talismans, road bows and carriage arrows gathered and obtained below the altar, reported the sacrifice with great feasting. Only those who receive the mandate and become emperors know its intention in their hearts and unite virtue there. The tripod should appear at the ancestral temples, be stored at the imperial court, to unite with the bright response.' The imperial edict said: 'Permitted.'

sentences.zh: 入海求蓬萊者，言蓬萊不遠，而不能至者，殆不見其氣。
上乃遣望氣佐侯其氣雲。

translations.literal: Those who entered the sea seeking Penglai said Penglai was not far, yet those who could not arrive probably did not see its qi. The emperor then dispatched a qi-gazer assistant marquis to its qi clouds.

sentences.zh: 其秋，上幸雍，且郊。
或曰「五帝，泰一之佐也。
宜立泰一而上親郊之」。
上疑未定。
齊人公孫卿曰：「今年得寶鼎，其冬辛巳朔旦冬至，與黃帝時等。」
卿有札書曰：「黃帝得寶鼎宛（侯）［朐］，問於鬼臾區。
區對曰：『（黃）帝得寶鼎神筴，是歲己酉朔旦冬至，得天之紀，終而復始。』
於是黃帝迎日推筴，後率二十歲得朔旦冬至，凡二十推，三百八十年。
黃帝僊登于天。」
卿因所忠欲奏之。
所忠視其書不經，疑其妄書，謝曰：「寶鼎事已決矣，尚何以為！」
卿因嬖人奏之。
上大說，召問卿。
對曰：「受此書申功，申功已死。」
上曰：「申功何人也？」
卿曰：「申功，齊人也。
與安期生通，受黃帝言，無書，獨有此鼎書。
曰『漢興復當黃帝之時。
漢之聖者在高祖之孫且曾孫也。
寶鼎出而與神通，封禪。
封禪七十二王，唯黃帝得上泰山封』。
申功曰：『漢主亦當上封，上封則能僊登天矣。
黃帝時萬諸侯，而神靈之封居七千。
天下名山八，而三在蠻夷，五在中國。
中國華山、首山、太室、泰山、東萊，此五山黃帝之所常遊，與神會。
黃帝且戰且學僊。
患百姓非其道，乃斷斬非鬼神者。
百餘歲然後得與神通。
黃帝郊雍上帝，宿三月。
鬼臾區號大鴻，死葬雍，故鴻冢是也。
其後於黃帝接萬靈明廷。
明廷者，甘泉也。
所謂寒門者，谷口也。
黃帝采首山銅，鑄鼎荊山下。
鼎既成，有龍垂胡髯下迎黃帝。
黃帝上騎，群臣後宮從上龍七十餘人，乃上去。
餘小臣不得上，乃悉持龍髯，龍髯拔，墮黃帝之弓。
百姓仰望黃帝既上天，乃抱其弓與龍胡髯號。
故後世因名其處曰鼎湖，其弓曰烏號。』」
於是天子曰：「嗟乎！
吾誠得如黃帝，吾視去妻子如脫屣耳。」
乃拜卿為郎，東使候神於太室。

translations.literal: That autumn, the emperor went to Yong, about to perform suburban sacrifices. Some said 'The Five Emperors are Taiyi's assistants. Should establish Taiyi and the emperor personally suburban sacrifice to it.' The emperor doubted and was not decided. The Qi person Gongsun Qing said: 'This year we obtained the treasured tripod. Its winter solstice on the xinsi new moon dawn is equal to Yellow Emperor's time.' Qing had a bamboo book that said: 'The Yellow Emperor obtained the treasured tripod at Wan Qu and asked Guiyu Qu. Qu replied saying: 'The emperor obtained the treasured tripod and divine tally. This year's winter solstice on the jiyou new moon dawn obtained heaven's chronicle, ends yet repeats begins.' Thereupon the Yellow Emperor welcomed the sun and pushed the tally. Afterward, every twenty years he obtained the new moon dawn winter solstice. Altogether twenty pushes, three hundred eighty years. The Yellow Emperor ascended to heaven as an immortal.' Qing because of Suo Zhong wished to memorialize it. Suo Zhong saw his book was not orthodox, doubted it was a false book, declined and said: 'The treasured tripod matter is already decided. What more is there to do!' Qing memorialized it through a favorite person. The emperor was greatly pleased and summoned Qing to question him. He replied saying: 'Shen Gong received this book. Shen Gong is already dead.' The emperor said: 'What person is Shen Gong?' Qing said: 'Shen Gong is a Qi person. He communicated with An Qisheng and received the Yellow Emperor's words. There was no book, only this tripod book. It said 'When the Han rises again, it should be the Yellow Emperor's time. The Han sage is Gaozu's grandson and great grandson. The treasured tripod emerges and communicates with spirits, fengshan. Fengshan seventy two kings, only the Yellow Emperor was able to ascend Taishan for the seal.' Shen Gong said: 'The Han lord should also ascend and seal. If he ascends and seals, he will be able to ascend to heaven as an immortal.' In the Yellow Emperor's time there were ten thousand feudal lords, yet divine spirits' seals resided at seven thousand. The realm has eight famous mountains, three are among the barbarian yi, five are in the central states. In the central states: Huashan, Shoushan, Taishi, Taishan, Donglai. These five mountains were what the Yellow Emperor often toured, meeting with spirits. The Yellow Emperor moreover fought and moreover learned about immortals. He worried that commoners were not following his way, so he judged and executed those who were not ghosts and spirits. Over a hundred years later he was then able to communicate with spirits. The Yellow Emperor performed suburban sacrifices to the Supreme Deity at Yong, lodging for three months. Guiyu Qu was styled Great Hong. He died and was buried at Yong. Therefore the Hong tomb is it. Afterward it connected ten thousand spirits at the Yellow Emperor's bright court. The bright court is Ganquan. The so-called cold gate is the valley mouth. The Yellow Emperor collected copper from Shoushan and cast the tripod below Jing mountain. The tripod was already completed when a dragon hung its beard whiskers below and welcomed the Yellow Emperor. The Yellow Emperor mounted and rode. His ministers and harem followed, over seventy people ascended the dragon, and then went up. The remaining small ministers were not able to ascend, so they all held the dragon's whiskers. The dragon whiskers were pulled, dropping the Yellow Emperor's bow. The commoners gazed upward as the Yellow Emperor already ascended to heaven. They then embraced his bow and the dragon's beard whiskers and wailed. Therefore later generations named that place Ding Lake because of it, and his bow Wu Call.'' Thereupon the Son of Heaven said: 'Alas! If I could truly be like the Yellow Emperor, I would regard leaving my wife and children like removing shoes.' He then appointed Qing as a lang and sent him east to await spirits at Taishi.

sentences.zh: 上遂郊雍，至隴西，西登空桐，幸甘泉。
令祠官寬舒等具泰一祠壇，壇放薄忌泰一壇，壇三垓。
五帝壇環居其下，各如其方，黃帝西南，除八通鬼道。
泰一所用，如雍一畤物，而加醴棗脯之屬，殺一牦牛以為俎豆牢具。
而五帝獨有俎豆醴進。
其下四方地，為餟食群神從者及北斗云。
已祠，胙餘皆燎之。
其牛色白，鹿居其中，彘在鹿中，水而洎之。
祭日以牛，祭月以羊彘特。
泰一祝宰則衣紫及繡。
五帝各如其色，日赤，月白。

translations.literal: The emperor then performed suburban sacrifices at Yong, arrived at Longxi, west ascended Kongtong, and went to Ganquan. He ordered the sacrifice officials Kuanshu and others to prepare the Taiyi sacrifice altar. The altar was modeled after Boji's Taiyi altar, with the altar in three layers. The Five Emperors' altars encircled and resided below it, each in their directions. The Yellow Emperor was southwest, except for the eight paths through to ghosts. What Taiyi used was like Yong's one altar things, but added sweet wine, dates, dried meats and such. He killed one yak ox to make the sacrificial vessels and ritual implements. Yet the Five Emperors alone had sacrificial vessels and sweet wine advanced. Below it in the four directions of earth, for meal food for the crowd of spirits' followers and the Northern Dipper clouds. After sacrificing, all remaining sacrificial meat was burned. Its ox was white in color. Deer resided in its middle, pigs in the deer middle, water and pour it. Sacrificed to the sun with an ox, sacrificed to the moon with sheep and pigs singly. For Taiyi the prayer butcher then wore purple and embroidery. The Five Emperors each followed their colors: the sun red, the moon white.

sentences.zh: 十一月辛已朔旦冬至，昧爽，天子始郊拜泰一。
朝朝日，夕夕月，則揖；
而見泰一如雍禮。
其贊饗曰：「天始以寶鼎神筴授皇帝，朔而又朔，終而復始，皇帝敬拜見焉。」
而衣上黃。
其祠列火滿壇，壇旁烹炊具。
有司云「祠上有光焉」。
公卿言「皇帝始郊見泰一雲陽，有司奉瑄玉嘉牲薦饗。
是夜有美光，及晝，黃氣上屬天。」
太史公、祠官寬舒等曰：「神靈之休，祐福兆祥，宜因此地光域立泰畤壇以明應。
令太祝領，（祀）［秋］及臘閒祠。
三歲天子一郊見。」

translations.literal: On the eleventh month xinsi new moon dawn winter solstice, before dawn was bright, the Son of Heaven first suburban bowed to Taiyi. Morning worship the sun, evening worship the moon, then bow; Yet seeing Taiyi was like the Yong ritual. Its assist feast said: 'Heaven first bestowed the treasured tripod and divine tally to the emperor. New moon and again new moon, ends yet repeats begins, the emperor respectfully bows and sees there.' Yet clothed above in yellow. Its sacrifice arranged fires that filled the altar, with cooking implements at the altar side. The officials said 'above the sacrifice there is light.' The dukes and ministers said 'the emperor first suburban saw Taiyi at Yunyang. The officials presented jade and good livestock for the recommended feast. That night there was beautiful light, and by day, yellow qi rose up and connected to heaven.' The Grand Historian and sacrifice official Kuanshu and others said: 'The spirits' auspiciousness brings blessing, fortune, omens, and good fortune. We should establish a Tai altar in this place of light domain to make the bright response clear. Order the grand prayer to lead, sacrifice between autumn and lacquer. Every three years the Son of Heaven once suburban sees.'

sentences.zh: 其秋，為伐南越，告禱泰一，以牡荊畫幡日月北斗登龍，以象天一三星，為泰一鋒，名曰「靈旗」。
為兵禱，則太史奉以指所伐國。
而五利將軍使不敢入海，之泰山祠。
上使人微隨驗，實無所見。
五利妄言見其師，其方盡，多不讎。
上乃誅五利。

translations.literal: That autumn, for attacking Nanyue, they informed and prayed to Taiyi. With male Jing they painted banners of sun, moon, Northern Dipper, ascending dragon to resemble the Tianyi three stars. They made it Taiyi's spearhead, named 'Spirit Banner.' When praying for troops, the grand scribe presented it and pointed to the country being attacked. Yet the Wuli general's envoy did not dare enter the sea and went to Taishan to sacrifice. The emperor had people secretly follow and verify, truly nothing was seen. Wuli falsely spoke of seeing his master. His methods were exhausted and many did not match. The emperor then executed Wuli.

sentences.zh: 其冬，公孫卿候神河南，見僊人跡緱氏城上，有物若雉，往來城上。
天子親幸緱氏城視跡。
問卿：「得毋效文成、五利乎？」
卿曰：「僊者非有求人主，人主求之。
其道非少寬假，神不來。
言神事，事如迂誕，積以歲乃可致。」
於是郡國各除道，繕治宮觀名山神祠所，以望幸矣。

translations.literal: That winter, Gongsun Qing awaited spirits south of Henan and saw immortal person traces above Gou city. There was a thing like a pheasant, coming and going above the city. The Son of Heaven personally went to Gou city to view the traces. He asked Qing: 'Can you not imitate Wencheng and Wuli?' Qing said: 'Immortals do not seek the ruler, the ruler seeks them. Their way is not a little broad and lenient, spirits do not come. Speaking of spirit matters, matters are like circuitous and fantastic. Accumulate with years and then they can be attained.' Thereupon the commanderies and kingdoms each cleared roads and repaired palaces, temples, famous mountains, and spirit shrine places to await fortune.

sentences.zh: 其年，既滅南越，上有嬖臣李延年以好音見。
上善之，下公卿議，曰：「民閒祠尚有鼓舞之樂，今郊祠而無樂，豈稱乎？」
公卿曰：「古者祀天地皆有樂，而神祇可得而禮。」
或曰：「泰帝使素女鼓五十弦瑟，悲，帝禁不止，故破其瑟為二十五弦。」
於是塞南越，禱祠泰一、后土，始用樂舞，益召歌兒，作二十五弦及箜篌瑟自此起。

translations.literal: That year, having already extinguished Nanyue, the emperor had a favorite minister Li Yannian who was seen for his good music. The emperor approved it and sent it down for the dukes and ministers to discuss, saying: 'Common sacrifices still have drum and dance music. Now suburban sacrifices have no music. How is this worthy?' The dukes and ministers said: 'The ancient ones sacrificed to heaven and earth and all had music, yet spirits could be obtained and ritualed.' Some said: 'The Tai emperor made Su Nu strum a fifty-string se. It was sad. The emperor forbade it but it did not stop. Therefore he broke his se into twenty-five strings.' Thereupon blocked Nanyue, prayed and sacrificed to Taiyi and Houtu. First used music and dance, increased summoned song children, made twenty-five strings and konghou se from this began.

sentences.zh: 其來年冬，上議曰：「古者先振兵澤旅，然後封禪。」
乃遂北巡朔方，勒兵十餘萬，還祭黃帝冢橋山，澤兵須如。
上曰：「吾聞黃帝不死，今有冢，何也？」
或對曰：「黃帝已僊上天，群臣葬其衣冠。」
即至甘泉，為且用事泰山，先類祠泰一。

translations.literal: Its next year winter, the emperor discussed and said: 'The ancient ones first shook the troops and moistened the army, then fengshan.' He then toured north to Shuofang, drilled over ten thousand troops, returned and sacrificed at the Yellow Emperor's tomb at Qiao mountain, moistened the troops at Xu Ru. The emperor said: 'I heard the Yellow Emperor does not die. Now he has a tomb. What is this?' Some replied saying: 'The Yellow Emperor already ascended to heaven as an immortal. His ministers buried his clothes and hat.' Immediately arrived at Ganquan, for about to use affairs at Taishan, first similar sacrifice to Taiyi.

sentences.zh: 自得寶鼎，上與公卿諸生議封禪。
封禪用希曠絕，莫知其儀禮，而群儒采封禪尚書、周官、王制之望祀射牛事。
齊人丁公年九十餘，曰：「封者，合不死之名也。
秦皇帝不得上封。
陛下必欲上，稍上即無風雨，遂上封矣。」
上於是乃令諸儒習射牛，草封禪儀。
數年，至且行。
天子既聞公孫卿及方士之言，黃帝以上封禪，皆致怪物與神通，欲放黃帝以嘗接神僊人蓬萊士，高世比德於九皇，而頗采儒術以文之。
群儒既以不能辯明封禪事，又牽拘於詩書古文而不敢騁。
上為封祠器示群儒，群儒或曰「不與古同」，徐偃又曰「太常諸生行禮不如魯善」，周霸屬圖封事，於是上絀偃、霸，盡罷諸儒弗用。

translations.literal: Since obtaining the treasured tripod, the emperor discussed fengshan with dukes, ministers, and various scholars. Fengshan used rare and vast things far removed. None knew its ritual etiquette. Yet the crowd of Confucians gathered fengshan Documents, Zhou officials, king systems' hope sacrifices and shoot ox matters. The Qi person Ding Gong, age over ninety, said: 'Feng is uniting the name of not dying. The Qin emperor was not able to ascend for feng. If your majesty must wish to ascend, gradually ascend and there will be no wind or rain, then ascend for feng.' The emperor thereupon ordered the various Confucians to practice shooting the ox and draft the fengshan ritual. Several years later, arrived and about to go. The Son of Heaven had already heard Gongsun Qing and the fangshi's words. From the Yellow Emperor above, fengshan all brought marvelous things and communicated with spirits. He wished to imitate the Yellow Emperor to taste connecting with divine immortal people Penglai scholars, high world compared virtue to the nine sovereigns, yet rather gathered Confucian arts to civilize it. The crowd of Confucians already because they could not debate and clarify fengshan matters, moreover were restrained by poetry books and ancient texts and did not dare to gallop. The emperor made feng sacrifice vessels and showed them to the crowd of Confucians. The crowd of Confucians some said 'not the same as ancient times'. Xu Yan moreover said 'The grand constant's various scholars performed ritual not as good as Lu'. Zhou Ba drew diagrams of feng matters. Thereupon the emperor demoted Yan and Ba, completely dismissed the various Confucians and did not use them.

sentences.zh: 三月，遂東幸緱氏，禮登中嶽太室。
從官在山下聞若有言「萬歲」云。
問上，上不言；
問下，下不言。
於是以三百戶封太室奉祠，命曰崇高邑。
東上泰山，山之草木葉未生，乃令人上石立之泰山顛。

translations.literal: In the third month, he then went east to Gou Shi, ritual ascended the central peak Taishi. Following officials at the mountain below heard as if there were words 'ten thousand years' and clouds. Asked the upper ones, the upper ones did not speak; Asked the lower ones, the lower ones did not speak. Thereupon with three hundred households sealed Taishi to serve the sacrifice, named Chonggao yi. East ascended Taishan. The mountain's grass and tree leaves had not yet been born. Then made people ascend and stone stood it at Taishan's peak.

sentences.zh: 上遂東巡海上，行禮祠八神。
齊人之上疏言神怪奇方者以萬數，然無驗者。
乃益發船，令言海中神山者數千人求蓬萊神人。
公孫卿持節常先行候名山，至東萊，言夜見一人，長數丈，就之則不見，見其跡甚大，類禽獸云。
群臣有言見一老父牽狗，言「吾欲見巨公」，已忽不見。
上既見大跡，未信，及群臣有言老父，則大以為僊人也。
宿留海上，與方士傳車及閒使求僊人以千數。

translations.literal: The emperor then toured east above the sea, performed ritual and sacrificed to eight spirits. 薄忌泰一及三一、冥羊、馬行、赤星，五，寬舒之祠官以歲時致禮。
凡六祠，皆太祝領之。
至如八神諸神，明年、凡山他名祠，行過則祀，去則已。
方士所興祠，各自主，其人終則已，祠官弗主。
他祠皆如其故。
今上封禪，其後十二歲而還，遍於五岳、四瀆矣。
而方士之候祠神人，入海求蓬萊，終無有驗。
而公孫卿之候神者，猶以大人跡為解，無其效。
天子益怠厭方士之怪迂語矣，然終羈縻弗絕，冀遇其真。
自此之後，方士言祠神者彌眾，然其效可睹矣。

Altogether six sacrifices, all led by the grand prayer.
